title: What’s My Crime?
description: If a panel fails to guess a criminal’s unusual crime in ten questions, he receives two weeks vacation at a fashionable seaside resort, all expenses paid. That is, of course, after he’s paid his debt to society.
altHero: the Quizmaster, a slender mustached man with glasses
alt1: a hopeful contestant in handcuffs sits with the Quizmaster
alt3: a clock with a sign below “On the air”
alt4: the contestant looks disappointed as a hand rests on his shoulder
